title: doc: document the SWIG support
body:
Just searched 'swig' on golang.com .
Got nothing except source code.

"Ian Lance Taylor" told me to file this in issue.

Besides a separate swig document.
It is more better if Go's major document mention about "Other language
binding"(eg. C/C++,...) solution (CGO or SWIG) to link back the SWIG document.


Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
go 1.1
